original_text: They used acacia wood to make bars to fix across the boards. They made five bars for the south side of the tabernacle, 32 five bars for the north side, and five bars for the west side at the back of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 그가 또 조각목으로 띠를 만들었으니 곧 성막 이쪽 널판을 위하여 다섯 개요

sentences.original_text: to make bars to fix across the boards
sentences.korean_translation: 널판지에 가로질러 고정할 막대를 만들기 위해

sentences.original_text: They made five bars for the south side
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 남쪽을 위해 다섯 개의 막대를 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: five bars for the north side
and five bars for the west side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 서쪽을 위해 다섯 개의 막대

sentences.original_text: at the back of the tabernacle
